name: Tap Tap Rush
description:
Tap Tap Rush is a 2D android arcade game that I developed within 3 days. Take your tapping speed to the limits. Tap and destroy the white tiles. Avoid the grey tiles, they are spiky!

Remember, tile speed increases with time. So, lets download this addictive game and let us tap, tap and rush!

By the way, this is my first released indie game. So, you download and give some comments on the comment section about the game and its graphics. No Ads in the game!
